slice.configuration.category.display.too: Options for the visual aspect of the menu.
slice.configuration.category.display.siz: Options for adjusting the size of UI elements
slice.configuration.display.size.radialM: Radius of the radial menu in pixels aka. the distance from the center of the screen
slice.configuration.display.size.itemSiz: Size of each item slot in the radial menu.
slice.configuration.display.size.slotSiz: Size of the slot background texture.
slice.configuration.display.visibility.b: When enabled, menu backdrop will be blured.
slice.configuration.display.visibility.h: When enabled, empty slots in the radial menu will be hidden
When enabled, remove the slot number from the radial menu
When enabled, no slot sprite will be displayed
slice.configuration.display.enableAnimat: When enabled, menu elements will be animated
slice.configuration.display.soundEffects: When enabled, menu will play soundeffects
slice.configuration.display.maxAngle.too: The max angle the menu can be.
slice.configuration.display.counterclock: When enabled, the radial menu rotates counterclockwise instead of clockwise
slice.configuration.category.behaviour.t: Options for changing how the mod behaves gameplay wise
slice.configuration.behaviour.toggleKeyb: When enabled, pressing the "Open menu" key will toggle the menu. (No need to keep holding the key)
slice.configuration.behaviour.quickSwitc: When enabled, closing the mnu without selecting an item will switch back to the priviously active slot.
slice.configuration.behaviour.clickToSel: When enabled, to switch to a desired slot, you'll need to click on the slot, not just release the button.
slice.configuration.behaviour.showToolti: When enabled, hovering over a slot will show the item's tooltip that's in that slot.
